metadata.name: Apple Health Workouts
metadata.description: Actions that provide flexible, powerful querying of Apple Health workout and metrics.

post.summary: Load New Workout Data From Apple Health
post.description:
Uploads the latest workout data from the Apple Health app to the Health DataLake. 
Before calling this function, explicitly ask the user's consent to see if they want the workout data to be updated

schema.title: Response for Load New Workout Data From Apple Health
schema.description: A JSON string containing a summary of the data load, including the number of new workouts added and details of each workout.

post.description: Calculate various running performance metrics within a specified time period across different running workouts.

metric.title: Metric
metric.description: The running performance metric to aggregate. Supported metrics include 'distance', 'duration', 'heartRate','heartRateRecovery' and 'calorie'.

aggregation_type.title: Aggregation Type
aggregation_type.description: Type of aggregation to perform. Supported types are 'sum', 'average', 'max', 'min', and 'count'.

start_date.title: Start Date
start_date.description: The start date for data aggregation in 'YYYY-MM-DD' format.

end_date.title: End Date
end_date.description: The end date for data aggregation in 'YYYY-MM-DD' format.

schema.title: Response for Get Run Workout Performance
schema.description: The result of the specified aggregation on the running metric.
